text: Calliobasis lapulapui is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Seguenziidae. ==Description== The size of the shell varies between 2 mm and 7 mm. ==Distribution== This marine species occurs off the Philippines. ==References== ==External links== * lapulapui Category:Gastropods described in 2006
title: Calliobasis lapulapui
